Room.Name: Tiamat Lane/Kista Avenue Intersection
Room.ShortDescription: You are at the intersection of Tiamat Lane and Kista Avenue.
Room.LongDescription: Tiamat Lane heads to the east from here, and Kista Avenue continues to the north and south. There is a small publishing company on the corner. Farther south, on the east side of the avenue, you see a building painted with pastel stripes.
